attributes.action: Make global warming a more well known thing - we have 20 years left currently
attributes.additional_details: Check you facts. Looking at the rate of temperature rise, if we go up more then 2.0°c we are doomed. Since 1900 we have gone up by 1.4°c and our rate is increasing every day at an alarming rate.
attributes.background: Everyone knows we are headed in the direction of earths destruction and our mass extinction. But what if I told you we have not 100s of years...but 20? We must act now or else we will go over the cliff of no return!
